product_overview: Foca.a√≠ is an intelligent personal assistant integrated directly within WhatsApp, designed to help users efficiently organize their finances, health, studies, and schedule through a simple and accessible interface.
core_goals: Provide a seamless and secure personal assistant experience within WhatsApp.
Enable efficient management of finances including income and expenses tracking.
Allow users to track their health with medication and appointment records.
Support academic task planning for better study organization.
Offer an intelligent agenda to manage user appointments and reminders.
Ensure high-level security standards including authentication, data protection, and webhook validation.
Integrate with third-party services such as Hotmart for payments and Google OAuth for authentication.
Deliver a responsive frontend powered by React with modern UI and accessibility standards.
key_features: Authentication system supporting login, registration, password recovery, JWT secure tokens, and Google OAuth integration.
User dashboard for quick access to financials, health tracking, study plans, and agenda overview.
Landing page showcasing product capabilities and branding.
Integration with Hotmart webhook handling with HMAC validation for payment events.
Comprehensive security implementations including CSP, HSTS, Rate limiting, CORS whitelist, and SSL/TLS certificates.
Form validation through React Hook Form with Zod schemas ensuring data integrity.
Structured logging using Winston with multiple log levels for auditing and debugging.
Configurable environment variables for database, SMTP, authentication secrets, and API tokens.
Roadmap feature planning including WhatsApp Bot integration, notifications, financial report generation, data exports, mobile app development, and automated testing.
user_flow_summary: User visits the landing page and accesses authentication to register or log in.
Upon successful login, user is directed to the dashboard featuring finance, health, studies, and agenda modules.
User can manage finances by adding income and expenses.
Users record medications and medical appointments to track health status.
Academic users plan their study tasks and receive notifications (planned feature).
User manages appointments and reminders via the intelligent agenda (planned feature).
User can make use of integrated payment features via Hotmart, receiving updates through secure webhooks.
System handles user session management securely with JWT tokens and session expiry.
User interacts with UI components built for accessibility and responsiveness across devices.
validation_criteria: Authentication is fully functional with secure JWT tokens and supports Google OAuth login.
Hotmart webhook events are received and validated using HMAC tokens to ensure security.
Dashboard reflects accurate and updated data for financials, health, studies, and agenda modules.
All forms across the app validate inputs with Zod schemas and reject invalid submissions.
Security headers including CSP, HSTS, and others are correctly applied to all pages.
Rate limiting effectively blocks brute-force and abusive traffic patterns.
CORS policies permit only whitelisted origins and prevent unauthorized API access.
SSL/TLS certificates are valid, and all communications are encrypted.
Logging captures sufficient detail on errors, warnings, and info events for audit and debugging purposes.
The app runs consistently across supported browsers and employs responsive design using Tailwind CSS.
Environment variables are correctly loaded and applied for database, email, authentication, and external APIs.
Code quality standards are met as verified by linting and passed test cases if available.
